name: Snow Leopard bookmark panel
description:
This style changes the bookmark panel to closely mimic the look of the dock menus in Mac OS X Snow Leopard.

Complete the Snow Leopard series with these styles:
style 20883
style 21763
style 24273
style 21832
style 24724
style 28658
additional_info:
*** UPDATES ***

09-03-12: Added Firefox 15 support.
06-06-11: Updated popup overlay to look slightly better
04-02-11: Fixed a bug in which the folder tree background is not gray.
04-02-11: Fixed a bug in which the text color would appear black.
03-27-11: Fixed a few bugs with using the style on Windows.
03-26-11: Updated style with Firefox 4 compatibility.
04-28-10: Update which may (or may not) fix an issue with folder names.
04-14-10: Minor update to panel appearance
02-21-10: Appearance revamp: the background now exactly matches the Snow Leopard menus.
02-18-10: A few minor improvements.
